title: R.E.D multi-gaming community.
body:
------------------------- Community Information -------------------------

We're only 2 months old, but already we've managed to create an oasis for League of Legends Players, with at least 50 active players and +100 Members on our Discord during peak times. We take pride in a sound and structured social area with tons of active and fun people. We now have our eyes set on expanding into other Games like Overwatch, WoW and CSGO. Here is a little list of what awaits you when you join:

·	 Active Players 
·	 Roles and chat rooms for all our games
·	 Easy to Join & Play
·	 Casual & Ranked Players Welcome
·	 Active & Dedicated Staff
·	 Loads of people like yourselves!

------------------------- Requirements -------------------------

We allow you to join if you meet the following requirements:

  Can Speak English to an appropriate level
  Respects and agrees to our rules( See Information room on Discord )
  A working microphone would be nice( not a requirement )
  Discord installed and a basic understanding of its uses.
  14 or older

If you do decide you are interested in joining, you'll need to hop onto our Discord. The first and most important thing for you to do is to read everything in the #information chat room. 
After that, you a are free to enjoy the community. Don't be afraid to talk to our staff if you have any questions.
League Name: Yesul ,,,, Discord Name: LennArt or add me on Steam 
Feel free to check us out and join the RED Community today at https://discord.gg/7uQQwh7
